channel.title: Webpage and ipb/vBulletin combined.. help please
channel.description:
OK, so i was wondering how would i combine my webpage and IPB forum together like stage6 (stage6 didnt use ipb, i dont think) did - http://stage6.divx.com/forums/ .
So I want it so, when people sign up at my web page, they are automatically signed up at the forum also. Also I would my forum to be embed into my web page like they did.
Anyone know how to do this?

item.title: Webpage and ipb/vBulletin combined.. help please
item.dc:creator: @Gtech_Warriors Gtech Warriors
item.description:
@Gtech_Warriors wrote:

ya i can probably do that…

but I dont know how to make the forum embed into the webpage…

Could someone do this for me if i pay them?

Read full topic
item.source: Webpage and ipb/vBulletin combined.. help please

item.title: Webpage and ipb/vBulletin combined.. help please
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

Make it so that when they sign up at your site it adds it into the same database as the Forums.
You should know how

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

they modified the layout files to add in a banner at the top

as for being reigstered too they got 2 methods

  1. when register it also adds you to the forum’s user db
  2. they just register you like the forums but uses the forums user db as their main user db and not have 2
